trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of controls contained on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control returns an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> which you can cast to an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection> includes controls such as the editing control and the scrollbars on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that owns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref>.
Removes all controls from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection.Clear%2A> method removes all controls from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, except the scroll bars and the editing control.

Copies the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref> into a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
array is `null`.
index is less than zero.
array is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of elements in the source collection is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
The type of the source element cannot be cast automatically to the type of array.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which to insert value.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref>.
index is less than zero or greater than or equal to the current number of controls in the .
Removes the specified control from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection"></xref>.
